footer_1: For data security reasons, we strongly recommend that you do NOT use a public computer or wireless network available to the public to access this system. Before accessing this system, please ensure that you have installed an up-to-date anti-virus software and anti-spyware software on your computer to protect it from viruses and malicious programs' attack.

user_guide_browse_welcome_desc: We're excited to have you here. This guide will walk through the essential features and functionalities of SIS. Let's get started and explore all the great things our app has offered!
user_guide_browse_search_bar_and_advance: You can search your created proposals. Click "Search" button to filter by specific criteria such as creation date, insured name and plan.
user_guide_browse_sorting_desc: Sorting helps you to locate your proposals more efficiently.
user_guide_browse_action_to_proposal_des: Select proposal by ticking the checkbox to download or delete. You can also multi-select or click the "Select all" checkbox for deletion. (Download multiple proposals are not allowed)
user_guide_browse_view_proposal_summary_: By clicking proposal card, you can view the proposal details.
user_guide_browse_create_proposal_desc: To create new proposal, click the “Create Proposal “ button at the top right corner.
user_guide_browse_rewatch_user_guide_des: You can always click the “Help” icon to review the user guide.
user_guide_create_proposal_begin_the_pro: To begin the proposal creation process
We are happy to have you here. This user guide will guide through the proposal creation processes, ensuring your success in delivering outstanding proposals. Let's get started!
user_guide_create_proposal_input_client_: Input Client Info and Select Product
Follow the instruction on screen to fill in the client information. Then you can select an applicable insurance plan that meet your client's needs in Step 2.
user_guide_create_proposal_quick_tools_b: Once you selected a product, you can tap on the Quick Tool button to view and update premium details throughout the proposal creation process (e.g. you can view the updated premium after adding riders) and apply UL Solve.
"Proceed to Step 5" button would also be activated once you have selected an insurance product allows you to skip Riders and UL change input.
user_guide_create_proposal_medical_benef: You are able to select medical benefits or riders (depends on the selected basic plan) at this step.
user_guide_create_proposal_ul_change_des: You can choose to illustrate future policy changes (such as paying unscheduled premiums or withdrawals) in the proposal. Certain products can have more than one change types. You can select the UL change either by policy year or age. The UL change details will be displayed once you click ”Apply” to confirm.
user_guide_create_tab_withdrawal_content: Refers to the future cash withdrawals from the policy during the policy lifetime.
user_guide_create_tab_medical_plan_premi: Simulate the future withdrawals from the policy for settling future premiums of medical benefits. Please be reminded that the future premiums of medical benefits illustrated is only an estimation, and does not represent actual future premiums.
user_guide_create_proposal_preview_desc: The PDF version is now ready for download. To generate the proposal, please click the "Download" button, and the proposal will be saved.
user_guide_create_proposal_summary_desc: Review the proposal checklist. You can jump back to previous steps to amend any information by simply clicking the navigation bar on top.
user_guide_create_proposal_setting_desc: Confirm the general setting (e.g. propsoal language) of the proposal.
user_guide_select_guide_start: Choose the journey to get started.
user_guide_select_guide_start_desc:
This guide will walk through the essential features and functionalities of SIS.
Let's get started!
user_guide_select_guide_create_proposal_: Input detail for creating a proposal
user_guide_select_guide_add_medical_bene: Attach medical plans to the proposal
user_guide_select_guide_ul_solve_desc: Solve the solution that satisfies your target
user_guide_create_application_guide_ride: Get to know more about rider!
On top of the basic plan, you can select riders to supplement and enrich the insurance protection. However, for certain basic plan, rider may not be available.
You are able to select riders at step 3.
user_guide_create_application_guide_add_: Click "Add Riders" and select the category, product, plan, class, sum insured, special rate table(optional), and flat special rate(optional).

The available riders depend on basic plan. Click "Apply" to confirm the change. There may be restrictions and requirements for adding certain riders. Pay attention to the red alert messages as you input.
Click the "Add new Rider" button to insert another rider.
user_guide_create_application_guide_revi: You can review the rider details in the displayed table.
user_guide_create_application_guide_edit: If you would like to make changes such as deleting riders or adding more riders, you can click "Edit Riders" to perform changes. Otherwise, click "Next" to proceed to the next step.
user_guide_create_application_guide_medi: Get to know more about medical benefit!

Medical benefit has different protection levels to choose, such as different deductibles or different protection limits. You can also add different types of medical insurance to the same policy to provide more comprehensive protection.
You are able to select medical benefit at step 3.
Click “Add Medical Benefits” and select product, plan/deductible, and special rate table(optional).

The available medical benefits depends on basic plan. Click "Apply" to confirm the change. There may be restrictions and requirements for adding certain medical benefits. Pay attention to the red alert messages as you input.
user_guide_create_application_guide_add_: Click the "Add new Medical Benefit" button to insert another medical benefit.
user_guide_create_application_guide_revi: You can review the medical benefit details in the displayed table.
user_guide_create_application_guide_edit: If you would like to make changes such as deleting medical benefits or adding more medical benefits, you can click "Edit Medical Benefits" to perform changes. Otherwise, click "Next" to proceed to the next step.
user_guide_create_application_guide_ul_s: Get to know more about UL Solve!
UL Solve would help to analyse your target input, then calculates and replacing the original input with the solution.
The UL Solve function can be found in the "Tools" button at the bottom right corner once you have selected the basic plan. This function allows you to solve for your target easily.

Enter the required solve details, including solve type, premium stop age, cash value target, and cash value target age. Keep in mind that certain “Solve Types” are only available for specific products.

Once you click the "Solve" button, it will be calculated automatically. Pay attention to the toast box pop up at the bottom left for the result. If there is no solution, the red toast box will be shown and you are required to change the input and solve again. If successful, you can preview "Solve Result" below.

Click apply to confirm the change, the solved result will be automatically applied and override your input. Keep in mind that if you have later made a change on any proposal input, the target may be different to the result your original solved.
browse_page_pdf_not_prepared_dialogmessa: This proposal was not generated successfully. If you want to continue, please click the "Edit proposal" to regenerate the proposal again.
browse_page_require_old_sis_dialogmessag: This proposal is obsoleted. You are not allowed to download the proposal.
browse_page_obsoleted_proposal_preview_n: This proposal is obsoleted. You are not allowed to edit the proposal.
browse_page_require_old_sis_preview_not_: Access the old version of SIS?
New version of SIS temporarily does not support this product. Please access the old version of SIS if you want to edit the proposal.
browse_page_reload_modal_description: This page is locked. You can press OK to unlock this page.
